processTimeZoneData.name: processTimeZoneData
processTimeZoneData.processRule: { contextVar.raw = contextVar.distance[0].rawOffset; contextVar.dst = contextVar.distance[0].dstOffset; contextVar.timeOffset = (contextVar.raw + contextVar.dst); contextVar.localDate = {}; contextVar.tmeValue = (parseInt(contextVar.timestamp, 10) + parseInt(contextVar.timeOffset, 10)); contextVar.localDate = new Date((contextVar.tmeValue + 0) * 1000); contextVar.strdate = JSON.stringify(contextVar.localDate); contextVar.currentSiteTime = contextVar.strdate.replace('T', ' ').replace('Z', '').replaceAll('"', ''); contextVar.onlytime = contextVar.currentSiteTime.split(' ')[1]; }

networkCJ5aW.name: networkCJ5aW
networkCJ5aW.description: Provide some description for your network node
